caseId.description: The Id of the SJP case to initiate

dateReceived.description: Date when case received from Magistrates court.

trialReceiptType.description: Trial case type E.g Either way case, Indictable, Transfer, Voluntary bail

eitherWayType.description: If trialReceiptType is Either way case, then this must be populated E.g Election of accused

courtReceivedFromCode.description: Magistrates court which sent the case. This is the organisation unit oucode. E.g B01BH00

courtReceivedToCode.description: Court receiving the case from magistrates court. This is the organisation unit oucode. E.g B01BH00

classOfCase.description: Class of case received from magistrates court. E.g Class 1, Class 2 etc.

policeForceCode.description: Police force code E.g '37' which represents the Suffolk police force

policeSystemId.description: Police System Id This is the value from RouteSourceSystem  element in OI layer

feeType.description: Indicates if a fee is initial or contested type

feeStatus.description: Indicates status of the fee according to fix list

paymentReference.description: Prosecutor reference for the fee payment

contestedFeeType.description: Indicates if a fee is initial or contested type

contestedFeeStatus.description: Indicates status of the fee according to fix list

contestedFeePaymentReference.description: Prosecutor reference for the fee payment

relatedUrn.description: related urn of the case which is related to this case

isRetrial.description: Indicates if the migrated XHIBIT case manually on the CP is a retrial
